project.name: CVAs
project.title: Coastal Vulnerability Assessment Software
project.definition: A GEE-based implementation for automated coastal vulnerability assessment

vision.primary: Provide a streamlined, cloud-based FOSS web application named CVAs that automates coastal vulnerability assessment
vision.development: Plans for a dedicated GitHub repository to serve as a central hub for community contributions, methodologies, and related developments

shoreline_extraction.name: Shoreline Extraction
capabilities: - Sentinel-1: VV/VH ratio with Otsu thresholding
- Sentinel-2: Multiple water indices (MNDWI, NDWI, AWEI, etc.)
Connected component analysis for patch filtering

scientific.rapidAssessment: Minimizes manual overhead for faster coastal hazard studies
scientific.scalability: Cloud-based approach scales to large or remote AOIs without hardware barriers
scientific.transparency: Open-source code fosters replicability and peer review
scientific.customizability: Researchers can adapt parameters for region-specific needs
